name: Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Liquidator of Rockwood Insurance Company, Appellant, v. ARGONAUT INSURANCE COMPANY

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and CAPPY, J., dissent.
parties: Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Liquidator of Rockwood Insurance Company, Appellant, v. ARGONAUT INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and CAPPY, J., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward F. Mannino, Virginia L. Hogben, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
625 A.2d 613
Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Liquidator of Rockwood Insurance Company, Appellant, v. ARGONAUT INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 5, 1993.
Decided May 24, 1993.
Jeffrey Cooper, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward F. Mannino, Virginia L. Hogben, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
